website_summaries.verdict: Affordable drone FPV goggle set for anyone wanting to start drone racing or FPV flying.
pros: Goggle set features a high-powered receiver for accurate and quick image delivery
Head strap is highly adjustable and comfortable to wear for long periods of time
cons: Goggles are difficult to adjust on some face sizes and shapes for the most comfortable results

customer_reviews.title: Good enough considering what it costs. It will get you started.
customer_reviews.text: It will get the job done for what you pay for it but plan on upgrading soon. When it’s comfortable on my face, my eyes look straight at the bottom of the screen so I have to pull it all the way down on my nose to see center screen without always looking up, I don’t have any other goggles to compre to but menus and screen are decent. I needed an adapter to put a better antenna on.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great goggle for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pros: fairly large screen usb chargeable battery pack decent durability Cons: uncomfortable on nose bridge for prolonged use battery lasts an hour no dvr You have to tilt your camera way up because the center of the screen is above the center of your eye line.
customer_reviews.author: cody.codemaster

customer_reviews.title: Great as a start
customer_reviews.text: This is great for beginners, picture seems like you're in a theater, sitting in the back, Way back. Picture is great. And you can adjust the picture for the environment you're using it for Battery is eh. Still on the good. Side. Just take care of the battery and it should last for a while
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Only if you must but if you must for you budget you wont regret it
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, video quality is usable but not the best, great for smaller shorter range drones (Diatone R239/King Kong ET115 v2/etc) but it died for no reason about a month and a half to 2 montha after I got it. I dont know why but it just stopped turning on one day.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Lester

customer_reviews.title: Either bad battery, or defective goggles?
customer_reviews.text: What started off as four stars. Quickly turned into 1 star. Packaging was fine. It was easy enough to set up. Tested it and everything worked great. I went to test a new VTX on my racing Quad and nothing. Will not power on. Even with a freshly charged battery. I haven't even flown with them yet. Just two test runs on my work bench. I hope to get this resolved, as I purchased these based on a majority of good reviews over more expensive goggles like Fat Shark. Edit: Amazon replaced with zero questions asked. So I'll bump it to a 3 for now. I will buy a few extra battery packs if the new one powers it up.
customer_reviews.author: RacerX

customer_reviews.title: Good for begjnner
customer_reviews.text: Great budget goggle for beginners or casual fp v pilots. Also good if you wear glasses since most will fit under the goggles
customer_reviews.author: lilibet

customer_reviews.title: Great for just getting into the hobby!
customer_reviews.text: This is where you need to start if you’re just getting into the hobby. Good value for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Logan P.

customer_reviews.title: If you have fat sharks..why even bother...just to brag? No need to show off your mommy/daddy money...
customer_reviews.text: These goggles rock..... absolutely not the best.... but rips up the basement and 1st floor... Clear enough view to thread the needle......worth the 62...
customer_reviews.author: Tbaerman

customer_reviews.title: Nice budget Goggle
customer_reviews.text: recieved my Eachine 007 pro in great shape. This is my first goggle and so far it is performing great. Easy to program and good picture for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Tech guy and could not get it to work
customer_reviews.author: Boxermomnh

customer_reviews.title: Works ok for entry level. Don’t expect a very ...
customer_reviews.text: Works ok for entry level. Don’t expect a very clear picture. I lost reception with LOS at about 100 feet
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles
customer_reviews.text: Best for starting out, especially for folks on a budget. Still have this as back up or to take someone for a “ride”
customer_reviews.author: Mafe Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Good starter. I am still using them going to ...
customer_reviews.text: Good starter . I am still using them going to try a better antenna
customer_reviews.author: David Keys

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived perfect. Sorry for the delay in qualifying, is that just arrive at the hotel today. Greetings.
customer_reviews.author: Leandro

customer_reviews.title: Dog Ate My Hobby
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic entry level FPV experience. Product not dog proof. Be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Cannot ad DVR to pro like you could with older version
customer_reviews.text: The 007 Pro has some significant changes from the previous 007. It doesn't look like you can easily wire in a DVR. The radio and display driver are now on a single board. There is a pad marked video but does not seem to have any signals on it. I also tried tapping into what I thought would be the pins with the video signal. I have an average sized adult head and find the top strap is too short needs an extra 0.5 inch of adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are not clear at all, almost unusable. The quality of the image is not very good.
customer_reviews.author: Slimjimtell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for price point. Performance is significantly improved with a cloverleaf antenna.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken even though it had a quality control pass sticker on it... Screen is 90% covered in horizontal white lines no matter what channel or even what mode it happens to be in. Definitely a problem with the screen and not just normal interference.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Burke

customer_reviews.title: One
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for three weeks, then the LCD went out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing range for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the price! Came to me with a clumsy antenna and broken Where the antenna screwed in so I’m sending it back for a new one but I was still able to connect the antenna and test it out. And to my surprise the range was great! At least 100 feet before noticeable static and noise. Also I’m using a 600TVL 200 miliwatt fpv camera so that also helps with the range! Either way, great for the price. Just hope UPS doesent damage the next one I get!
customer_reviews.author: Mac Junky

customer_reviews.title: Goggles worked well for 2 hours and then died
customer_reviews.text: I was initially pretty pleased with these for the price. The picture was acceptable for flying and they are pretty comfortable. Reception was sufficient as well. Unfortunately the 3rd day I owned them, after about 2 hours of total flight time, the screen went black and will not come back on. The battery was charged and reading 50% when the screen blacked. The extent of their use was sitting on my couch flying a whoop inside. I have checked all the external connections I can. I dont want to disassemble a new item to check for broken solder joints. I have initiated a return and will update my review it anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W

customer_reviews.title: Meh..
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok.. but for the price what can anyone complain about really.. Yeah, the picture is not the best quality and the plastic feels cheap. But it gets the job done and it’s comfortable on my face. All in all, not too shabby.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome range, throw away the antenna and buy a polarized antenna. I it is not choppy even at 200 yards away.
customer_reviews.author: Banner Eric

customer_reviews.title: FUN! I have a Holy Stone Mercury 3 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap ..does the job...FUN! I have a Holy Stone Mercury 3 and it works flawlessly. I could see myself using this for quite a while and then upgrading to fancy pants goggles. These are perfectly cool for now though
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Best introductory FPV goggles for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Video image is good. Battery is well paired for size, weight, and heat. Antenna is just okay. Overall, this is the best introductory set of FPV goggles for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Hook

customer_reviews.title: Ooooffff
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for 63 also need to buy a new antenna for 8t and I recommend you do the same
customer_reviews.author: Minecraft child

customer_reviews.title: No real world test it, but seem good, played with in the house.
customer_reviews.text: I've only played with them in the house, no real world test yet!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Put new antenna on and it has good range I guess
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Put new antenna on and it has good range I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and link to the wto5 micro camera.
customer_reviews.author: ben coleman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing started FPV headset.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are great. Bright, clear video. Quite comfortable too. Would absolutely recommend it for people thinking of getting into FPV.
customer_reviews.author: Piotr Turula

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these goggles only complaint wish they had a DVR recorder
customer_reviews.author: Ben smiddy

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING GOGGLES!!!
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are a great budget pick, and work amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Cathie Lio

customer_reviews.title: Price and fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit of these goggles, and the FOV is nice. Wish it had a channel search function. But, overall nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AnthonyB

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for beginners
customer_reviews.text: These are good headsets to get if you're brand new into the hobby and don't want to drop hundreds on a good pair till you know you like FPV. If you do end up sticking with it, you'll want to upgrade. But keep these around as a spare set for spectators to use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ogle Jr.

product_meta.title: EACHINE VR-007 Pro 5.8G 40CH FPV Goggles 4.3 Inch Video Headset Glasses with 3.7V 1600mAh Battery
feature_bullets: Upgraded receiver, with Power Indicator and Frequency Display.
Customized eyeglass, myopia below 400° needn't to wear glasses.
Settled three-point fillet can reduce the pressure of long-time wear to the head.
High softness, ventilate and environmental sponge fit the contours of the face, more comfortable, less ambient light.
Standard 1600mAH 3.7V (1S) Lipo battery, with power display function, supports USB 5V charging, long life.
